message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that's worth a lot to me. I'm willing to let it go for $9,500.  It's a great deal for both of us, so let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it, which is still within my budget. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Hey Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While $9,000 is closer, I'm still looking for a bit more to make this worthwhile for me.  How about we split the difference and settle on $9,250? This would give you a great deal on the product while still allowing me to reach a fair price.  Let me know what you think!

I understand your position, Alice. I've done some research and found that the market value for this product is closer to $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9,125. This offers you a good return on your investment while staying within my budget.
